dataList.content: โปรดให้ปีกปักษานี้โบกสบัดพัดขึ้นสู่ฟ้า
เพื่อไล่ตามกลิ่นบุปผาที่พลัดจากสุดไกลโพ้น
อา สุดขอบฟ้านี้นั้นไซร้ เจ้าเนินบุหงาพักอยู่หนใด
วันนี้กลบฝังเจ้าอรไท
วันไหนที่ใครจะฝังข้า?
วันนี้กลบมาลย์คนว่าไร้ปัญญา
วันหน้าใครเล่าจะฝังเรา?
หน้าหลุมศพนี้ไร้ซึ่งผู้ใดร่ำไห้
เพราะเมื่อสิ้นวสันต์และบุษบันไซร้
ไกลจากบินล่องแลละอองเอย
เอาล่ะ! หยิบแก้วกันขึ้นมานะ~
อะแฮ่มๆ แด่ซีชุนที่ได้ขึ้นเป็นประมุขตระกูล!

dataList.place: ต้ากวนหยวน - โถงบำเรอเอ้าจิงก่วน
dataList.content: คัมปาย!
Once all the guests had taken their seats, the banquet hall became packed, crowded, and chaotic.
... Except for where we were sitting.
... คะ-คัมปาย!
อะไรอะ~? ทำไมถึงไม่มีคนมาอะไรกันเลย? เวลาแบบนี้มันต้องกิน ต้องดื่ม ต้องเล่น ต้องสังสรรค์เพื่อเอาแรงไว้สำหรับภารกิจต่อไปสิ?
อย่างไรนั้นข้าก็ทำ...
ฮ้า~ พอมาลองนึกๆ ดูแล้ว สงสัยจังว่าครั้งนี้เซาด์เธอได้เขียนจดหมายยินดีให้กับเราไหมนะ?
บ๋อย บ๋อย! มีจดหมายหรืออะไรแบบนั้นได้ส่งมาถึงพวกเราบ้างไหม?
...? วันนี้เราไม่ได้รับจดหมายหรือแม้แต่ข้อความเลยนะ...
ชิ๊ ไม่ให้เกียรติกันเลย เราคือที่สองเลยนะ ที่สองๆ น่ะ~?
Rodya grumbled. I wasn't sure whether it was this poor servant or the oddly silent Saude she was calling rude.
เป่าอี้น้อย... เจ้ามิได้บาดเจ็บตรงไหนใช่ไหม?
ครับ ข้าไม่เป็นไร
แม่ได้แต่เป็นห่วงเจ้าตลอดทั้งงานเลย... ไฉนเจ้าถึงได้เลือกทำสิ่งที่แสนจะอันตรายถึงเพียงนั้นด้วยกัน...?
แล้วเจ้ามาถึงที่นี่... ได้เยี่ยงไร?

อาฮ่า! ท่านหมายถึงเรื่องนั้นสินะ? อะแฮ่มๆ หากให้ข้าได้ตั้งชื่อของเรื่องราวการผจญภัยในครั้งนี้ คงจะเป็นเมื่อครั้งที่ลิมบัส คอมพานีได้รับเกียรติยศอันสูงส่งให้ได้เป็นลำดับที่สอง! ฟังดูเหมาะสมยิ่งนัก เอาล่ะ เรื่องราวนี้จักมิได้ใช้เวลาในการเล่านานนัก ฉนั้นแล้ว~
ก้อนกำแพงได้บีดอัดเข้ามาหาเราทีละนิดๆ ! ผู้ท้าชิงต่างก็กระโจนใส่ไม่บรรยะบรรยัง! เช่นนั้นแล้วความยากลำบากนี้จักเป็นจุดจบของเราหรือไม่? แน่นอนว่าเรา...
... ดูเหมือนนางจะเข้าใจอะไรผิดไป สิ่งที่แม้อยากจะถาม... คือเจ้าเดินทางมาที่นี่โดยใช้อะไรเท่านั้น
อา เราขึ้นวอมากันครับ ท่านแม่
... นั่นสินะ เช่นนั้นเจ้าก็คงยังมิได้ไปสักการะท่านเซียนสินะ
มิใช่ว่า... เจ้าควรไปเยี่ยมพวกท่าน... ก่อนหรอกหรือ...?
ข้ามั่นใจว่าพวกท่านอยากได้ยินจากเจ้าเป็นอย่างยิ่งเลย
ครับ เดี๋ยวข้าจะรีบไปเยี่ยมพวกท่าน
ถึงพวกท่านจะอยากได้ยินจากข้า แต่พวกท่านคงไม่ได้อยากได้ยินข่าวเกี่ยวกับข้าหรอกครับ
แปลว่าท่าน... ก็กลับมาได้อย่างปลอดภัยสินะเพคะ
ไต้อี้~! เธอไม่เป็นไรสินะ!
ค่ะ บาดแผลของข้าได้ทุเลาลงแล้ว
โชคยังเข้าข้าง บาดแผลนั้นมิได้สาหัสสากรรจ์จนถึงต้องใช้ประกันชีวิตค่ะ
จะอย่างไรก็เถิด… แล้วพวกท่านไปทำเยี่ยงไรถึงได้มาอยู่ที่นี่กัน?
อาฮ่า ! ถ้าหมายถึง— อา เออ...
อะแฮ่ม... เราโดยสารวอ... มาน่ะ
... อะไรนะเพคะ?
ดอนกิโฮเต้? จะดูยังไงเธอก็ถามเราว่าได้ที่สองกันยังไงมากกว่านะ
... อาฮ่า เป็นเช่นนั้นจริงหรอกหรือ!?
ใช่ค่ะ เป็นเยี่ยงนั้นเลย หากไม่เป็นการรบกวนอะไร ท่านจะพอเล่าเหตุการณ์ที่เกิดขึ้นให้ข้าทราบหน่อยได้หรือไม่
เช่นนั้นแล้ว...?
เอาเลย เอาเลย เชิญจัดชุดใหญ่ได้เลย
อุฮิอุฮิอุฮิ ก๊ากก๊าก... เข้าใจแล้ว! เช่นนั้น ถ้าเราจะเริ่มตรงไหนกัน...
... ก็ต้องเป็นตอนที่เราได้เข้าไปอยู่ร่วมห้องเดียวกัน... กับเจี่ยและเจี่ยฮวนนั่นเอง—

dataList.place: Final Room of the Evaluation, Recent Past
dataList.content: ... หลังจากสนทนากันเสร็จแล้ว จู่ๆ เจี่ยชิวเขาก็...
... departeth the chamber, taking his entire retinue alongside him! A most puzzling decision, wouldst thou not say?!
Oi! Quit screamin' every bloody sentence in my ear!
Ahem... thus... uhm... at the climactic finale...
... we were the only ones left in that room.
Alone with over one-hundred coins that Jia Qiu had left behind...
... as he and Jia Huan both suddenly elected to forfeit from the game.
W-well... what now?
At this strange turn of events, we all stood around aghast and dumbfounded.
Even Ishmael was stuttering, just as confounded and lost as anyone else was about what happened.
So... claiming these coins is going to shoot us up to the top of the leaderboard, right...?
B-but why...? Why'd he dump all these coins on us?
Lass, you know this is the fifth time you've asked that exact same question, yeah?
Hm... I don't have a clue, either. Brother Jia Qiu really is hard to read...
I see that your expression has grown a touch brighter, Hong Lu.
... Has it?
Mm. Perhaps something has been unshackled from within.
I just didn't think I'd ever say anything like that.

dataList.place: Final Room of the Evaluation, Recent Past
dataList.content: ... is kindness.
To be kind is to care about one another, to embrace those who suffer.
It is to cry alongside a grieving friend. It is to join in laughter when they are elated with joy.
It needs the warmth of kindness and gentleness.
Your words...
... flow like a vast, winding river that wishes to bring all of existence into its gentle embrace.
I thought...
I thought I'd already let all of it flow past me a long, long time ago.
Hong Lu's expression had changed, just as Yi Sang observed. There was a degree of surprise shown toward something new, but... it was also the smile of someone whose burden had suddenly been lifted.
Never in my wildest dreams did I imagine that we'd find ourselves enough coins to come in second place, let alone first.
... Hey, that reminds me.
At that moment, I'm pretty sure we were all thinking of the same person.
Wait, there's someone out there who's still trying her damnedest to become the Family Hierarch.
And she still hasn't given up.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: Gyah...! Huff, huff... Holy crap, I almost got pancaked...

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: Are you alright, my lady?

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: ... The heck are you guys doing here?
<Hi, we've been looking for you.>

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: What... what? Somebody translate, please?

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: Why's everyone giving me that funny look?!
Some time later...

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: You're... just giving me all these coins?
Totes~ We're cool now, right? No hard feelings?
Xichun and Wei couldn't appear more serious if they tried, despite Rodya's chummy attempts at breaking the ice.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: What… what the hell is this? Is this your way of showing pity? What kind of—
Here’s what I think happened, Xichun.
Brother Qiu isn't trying to seat me as the next Hierarch by giving me all these coins.
I believe he gave them to me because he's anticipating that I'd put them to good use.
So no, this isn't pity.
I just feel like they'd find more use in your hands than in mine.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: Don’t... don’t you dare presume this’ll suddenly make us even.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: You... owe me much, much more than this, brother. You owe me time.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: ... My lady expresses her nigh-unutterably fathomless gratitude.
Normally, Xichun would get irritated whenever Wei butted in, but she appeared to have grown calmer. Much calmer.
Instead of lashing out with her usual exasperation, she only stared at the tall pile of coins with a quiet but conflicted look.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: Funny.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: Now that I’m looking at these piles of coins, it feels like…

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: It feels like I’m looking at all the rooms of Daguanyuan. I used to hate that sight so much as a kid…

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: ... but I eventually grew out of that feeling. Stopped minding that scenery.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: I guess that's when... I guess that's when I decided to leave Daguanyuan, too.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: The Family Hierarch, huh...

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: Can I... can I really be a good Hierarch to Hongyuan?
Yes, you can.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: ...There you go again. For once, think before you speak.
Time to get up, Xichun.
The Family Hierarch Evaluation will end soon.
… What are you doing, Heathcliff?
Givin’ that camera the finger. What are they gonna do, disqualify me? Game’s over, you twits.
Alas! With eyes shut, with my mind's focus sharply upon that image, the vision cometh to me! Oh, there cometh the roaring applause...!
There was no audience, no applause, nor dramatic stage lights to celebrate our success, but...
... we still managed to neatly and comfortably secure both first and second place nonetheless.
Which means that we managed to successfully complete our objective here at the Family Hierarch war.

dataList.place: ต้ากวนหยวน - โถงบำเรอเอ้าจิงก่วน
dataList.content: ... Yeah, that pretty much sums it up.
Gregor, who took the reins of Don Quixote’s epic retelling after she left mid-explanation to share her adventurous tales with the servants, finished the story.
... I see. So it was Jia Qiu...
I'm still having some trouble understanding the choice he made. Why'd he just give it all away?
Perhaps the part of Jia Qiu's past we witnessed...
... and the life he lived beyond the hedges of Daguanyuan, of which we do not know...
... have created this schism of understanding between us. The same kind of separation responsible for my misunderstanding.
I initially thought he was just some dangerous guy with a lot of hatred in him, but...
... there's definitely something else going on under the surface. It doesn't seem like he's here only to take revenge against Daguanyuan, either...
But... I doubt he never considered vengeance. I'm sure he's killed those who took his family away from him again and again in his head.
Maybe... maybe he still hasn't let go of it completely.
It must take a lot of effort to keep all of that simmering resentment under the surface.
Sinclair muttered in a placid, yet almost imperceptibly trembling voice.
Yeah, I've got no clue what's goin' on in that bloke's mind, but...
He didn't seem like the type to give up so easily.
I agree. We should continue to stay vigilant of his presence.
Well, anyhoo!
What really matters is that Xichun's gonna be the next Hierarch!
And not only that, we came in second in the contest! Mission accomplished, huh?
It appeared to me that Rodya was already in a post-mission mode as though the Golden Bough was already in our hands.
Ahem, so... I'm just saying, just in case you think we're already out of the woods...
We should... probably cool it with these early celebrations until we actually accomplished the mission...
Nah, no way... They wouldn’t boldly lie to our faces like that, would they?
... I feel like I just jinxed it.
We were really down to the wire this time, to be fair.
And I'm not talking about just us—Xichun, too.
Hah. That's why they say it ain't over 'til it's over, lad.
Oi, I think this is a prime opportunity for you to head over to those pompous sods from earlier. Now's your chance to really take the piss out of 'em.
Fuhu, I don't think that's necessary.
Not every candidate we ran into during the Hierarch war was here.
And those who were present were either quietly glaring down at their tables or pulling their hair out and muttering to themselves.
Anyways~ Xichun! Congrats, you big shot Family Hierarch, you!
How's it feel to achieve your lifelong dream? Ooh, what's the first thing ya wanna do, hm?
I immediately clocked you as a special one when I saw you back at La Manchaland. We weren't half bad as partners, huh?
Let Wei not be excluded from this round of acknowledgements, as he has contributed much in the service of Miss Xichun as well. Your unwavering determination was most inspiring.
Yeah, right? Never give up, always see things through to the end!

Verily, verily!!! Thy sentiment rings most true! Thus share the tale of young Xichun and Limbus Company with the rest of the City shall I, so that every soul may one day learn of our adventure most stupendous! I shall personally see to it that every single Citizen hears of it!
Doesn't have to be every soul, you know...
Well... I can't help but feel a smidge of pride after all that we've been through together.
So... um, well... congrats.
Even Ishmael joined in to impart a sheepish 'congrats'.
But...
<Guys... uh... >
<Xichun's not here... >
... it seemed that, in their excitement, they all failed to realize that Xichun herself was nowhere to be seen.
Ah, Xichun’s left for the <ruby=Iron Threshold>Tiekan Temple</ruby>(鐵檻寺) to have her ascension to the Hierarchdom confirmed by the elders.
<I see, thanks... Also, would you mind telling us stuff like that sooner...?>
... Huh, hold on. I know that bloke...
Heathcliff rolled up his sleeves before striding full-speed toward someone.
Oi, you there. Got anythin' clever to say to our faces now, smartarse?
Yeah, smart... guy?
Nice to meet you again, and kudos for getting what you came here for. Is that what you wanted to hear?
Heh, for all your boastin' about knowing who deserves how many coins and whatnot... look at us now. Guess who came first?
Well, my coins have circulated from hand to hand and landed in the hands of the one who truly deserved them.
Which clearly wasn't you guys, given that your team's just a runner-up.
You little—
Let me tell you something as my final token of appreciation.
Stormclouds are gathering. And it'll be making landfall soon enough.
... Huh? What's that supposed to mean?
Try to enjoy the party while you can. In no time, you'll find out what everyone's been hiding in their hands.
His concerning reply put a pause on our celebrations. We then slowly observed and took in our surroundings.
People were talking, negotiating in serious, hushed voices. Some were constantly and anxiously running their hands through their hair...
We also noticed some servants running to whisper certain messages to their masters, who in turn jumped to their feet before hurriedly leaving the banquet.
... Looks like we're the only group of people who are even remotely enjoying anything.
Sure, it's a banquet, but...
Xichun, our Hierarch girl, isn't even here... everyone's acting all shifty and suspicious...
This party sucks!
Rodya whined loudly...
... as she chewed on a shrimp with just as much gusto.
I… I must express my regrets for this state of affairs.
Daiyu apologized as though she somehow felt responsible for this.
Well, I... I do have some minor tricks of my own that could entertain you...
I learned a lot of things as a child, blade dance being one of them...
Ooh, for real? Let's see, let's see.
Hey, what the hell! We're here as guests, remember? Don't be a jerk...
Hey... Baoyu...
